description:
Keep little hands visible during the shorter months. These waterproof and warm mittens have a fully reflective material on the cuff, helping kids stay seen in dim conditions.

  • Durable nylon shell has fully reflective material on the cuff for visibility at night
  • DriTex waterproof insert blocks wind and water to keep hands dry
  • Mirafil® Silver insulation provides warmth
  • Soft brushed Bemberg lining
  • Adjustable wrist strap for custom fit and trap heat
  • Elastic cord and storm cuff to keep snow out
name: Auclair Be Seen Cuff Mitts - Children
